p.s: The exerptexcerpt of Michel Barnier's speech at the EACCEuropean American Chamber of Commerce is about the Brexit and it'sits assumed results.
He also speaks about his personal opinion.
The speech was held in New York at the 10th of July in 2018.
His audience are the members of the EACCEuropean American Chamber of Commerce, but the speech is accessible to public aswellas well.
He mainly focuses on the consequences of Brexit.
Such as a weaker EU, an upcoming friction in trade, impact on value chains for several economic sectors and impact in certain manufacturing, logistic and food sectors.
Another focus of his speech is to point out the characteristics of a close relationship between the UK and the EU.
Barnier says that a close relationship would strengthen both EU and especially the UK.
He points out that both of them would suffer finaciallyfinancially and logistically.
